column4: Traffic;Phnom Penh: According to preliminary reports
column7: heavy rains in the middle of Phnom Penh have flooded some streets. The drainage system was clogged
column8: causing water to flow out over the roads.------So far
column9: the main areas that seem to be affected were around Russian Blvd and Chom Chao. More images: ------KOHSANTEPHEAP
